name: Breathless Zero
description:
In the land of Averleaf, where lies the vast garden of flowers located. On that day, the poisonous gas suddenly spread, covering the entire land. The hope lies within the Greenhorn Garden, where the Zero Breather attempt their run to rescue the land by destroying the Giant Snakeroot before everything change into poisonous marsh.

.

Laying down the prototype here. Time to switch.
